review: I wasn't sure what to expect with such a low profile device, but am very pleased with the Fire Stick. It was a very simple setup with a good tutorial.
author: Mark Galaydick

review: Easy to set up.  Works great with Netflix.  Also downloaded app for my iphone to use as remote with this and that works as well.  Great alternative to a laptop or netbook if you don't have a Smart TV.
author: Regular Amazon Customer

review: We love it so much we bought another one for a different TV.

review: This should be called a Magic Fire Stick! There is literally nothing to installing it and it works right out of the box; converting a regular TV into a smart TV. I love it.
author: Jean Fitzpatrick

review: I was surprised by the amount of both tv shows and movies that are pay per view. The stick itself is wonderful, easy to install and maneuver about in.
